about_the_game:
Getaway is a match-3 character development game with an overhead background. Players can resist the changes of the six qi in the game, grow through exploration and encounters, harvest and grow in battle, balance the elements to control chaos, and explore the mysteries of the land of nothing.

In ancient times, there were six air currents, reflecting the outline
Heaven and earth are unkind, and all things are dogs,
People are not willing to do this, rebuild the rules, break the law of all things with themselves, and establish their own laws to override all things.
However, different people have different ways, different ways give birth to different laws, different laws give rise to endless incidents, endless incidents create endless killings, and eventually cause the heavens to be angry, the six qi are out of tune, natural disasters are frequent, all things become demons, grains are not harvested, and the people are not able to make a living
This is where the story begins
detailed_description:
Getaway is a match-3 character development game with an overhead background. Players can resist the changes of the six qi in the game, grow through exploration and encounters, harvest and grow in battle, balance the elements to control chaos, and explore the mysteries of the land of nothing.

In ancient times, there were six air currents, reflecting the outline
Heaven and earth are unkind, and all things are dogs,
People are not willing to do this, rebuild the rules, break the law of all things with themselves, and establish their own laws to override all things.
However, different people have different ways, different ways give birth to different laws, different laws give rise to endless incidents, endless incidents create endless killings, and eventually cause the heavens to be angry, the six qi are out of tune, natural disasters are frequent, all things become demons, grains are not harvested, and the people are not able to make a living
This is where the story begins
name: 逍遥游兮
short_description: 逍遥游兮是一款架空背景的三消RPG游戏。玩家可以游历大陆，御六气之变，与异兽战斗，领悟不同心法
